oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Confederate Reunion Ribbon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A red silk Confederate reunion ribbon belonging to 2nd Lt. Jefferson Bilbrey, Co. B, 25th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. Bilbrey enlisted on July 30, 1861 at Livingston, Tenn. He was discharged due to disability at Iuka, Miss. April 1, 1862. The reunion ribbon is dated September 23, 1889, Livingston, Tenn.
